titleStmt.title: Reformation no enemie, or, A true discourse betweene the bishops and the desirers of reformation wherein is plainely laid open the present corrupt government of our church, and the desired forme of government plainely proved by the word of God.
Hay any worke for Cooper
titleStmt.author: Marprelate, Martin, pseud.
Penry, John, 1559-1593.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to John Penry by NUC pre-1956 imprints.
"A reissue of H̀ay any worke for Cooper ́which first appeared in 1589"--NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
